tool_description: A GraphQL API for a chat app with users, members, servers, channels, servers, etc.
name: rollicate
title: rollicate

api_list.name: graphQL
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rollicate.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rollicate.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
